overview: Our story follows Abdallah and his fight for survival in one of the most toxic places on earth, Agbogbloshie, Ghana. Beyond the deadly fumes of the electronic dump and scrapyard, lies a community that wins his heart. Abdallah forms a special bond with Kofi and Lartey, two boys who look to Abdallah for dreams of a life beyond the dump.
title: Kofi and Lartey
